sentences.en: A pack of bloodhounds accompanied the men, including Balboya's stowaway bloodhound.
sentences.cn: 一群猪狗伴随着他们, 其中包括巴尔博亚那条偷运来的猪狗.

sentences.en: Following the trail with the sureness of a bloodhound, came the general.
sentences.cn: 就象尾随追踪的凶猛猎狗那么准确, 将军跟了上来.

sentences.en: Volatile substances usually strike the bloodhound's nose as an entire constellation of distinctive scents.
sentences.cn: 猎犬的鼻子通常遇到易挥发性的物质时能辨别出那是完全不同的一组气味.

words.tran_cn: 侦探猎犬；毫不放松的追赶着；侦探
